amendment.description: Amendments en bloc printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 consisting of amendments numbered 66, 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 76, 77, 80, 82, 83, 85, 86, 89, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 98, 99, 100, and 101.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendments (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
